Package com.deezer.sdk.player

This package contains Java classes used to play Deezer music.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Player
    Defines the behavior of a player in Deezer SDK.
    PlayerWrapper
    Defines the behavior of a player wrapper in Deezer SDK.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AlbumPlayer
    A PlayerWrapper used to play a Deezer Album.
    ArtistRadioPlayer
    A PlayerWrapper used to play a Deezer Artist's Smart Radio.
    CustomTrackListPlayer  
    DefaultPlayerFactory
    Default implementation of the PlayerFactory.
    PlaylistPlayer
    A PlayerWrapper used to play a Deezer Playlist.
    RadioPlayer
    A PlayerWrapper used to play a Deezer Radio.
    TrackPlayer
    A PlayerWrapper used to play Deezer Tracks
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    PlayerWrapper.RepeatMode  

Package com.deezer.sdk.player Description

This package contains Java classes used to play Deezer music.

The DefaultPlayerFactory creates a basic Player instance.

The PlayerWrapper classes ( AlbumPlayer, PlaylistPlayer, TrackPlayer, RadioPlayer and ArtistRadioPlayer ) are usefull classes to play Deezer albums, playlist, tracks, radio and artist's smart radio (respectively).

Author:
Deezer
